name: David Gaider
info:
• 简体中文名: 戴维·盖德
  • 别名: Dave Gaider
  • 性别: 男
  • imdb_id: nm1895826
detail: David Gaider was a writer at BioWare's Edmonton studio from 1999 until 2016. He joined Beamdog from 2016 until 2018. He was the Lead Writer of the Dragon Age series, including the games Dragon Age: Origins, Dragon Age II, and Dragon Age: Inquisition, and was responsible for story and setting design.
